xx.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Complete all the Breaking and Entering challenges:
  • Public Enemy No. 1
  • Forgot My Keys
  • The Keymaker
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_CROWBAR_DESC: <li>With a crowbar, unlock the front doors of the Cassidy, Janus, Schmidt, and West properties.</il>
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_POLICE_DESC:
• Pacify 3 police deputies.
  • Don't let their bodies be found.

en.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Complete all the Breaking And Entering challenges:
  • Public Enemy No. 1
  • Forgot My Keys
  • The Keymaker
en.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_CROWBAR_DESC: • With a crowbar, unlock the front doors of the Cassidy, Janus, Schmidt, and West properties.
en.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_POLICE_DESC:
• Pacify 3 police deputies.
  • Don't let their bodies be found.

fr.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Terminez tous les défis de Par effraction :
  • Ennemi public nº 1
  • J'ai oublié mes clés
  • Le serrurier
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_CROWBAR_DESC: • Ouvrez la porte d'entrée des propriétés de Cassidy, Janus, Schmidt et West au pied-de-biche.
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_POLICE_DESC:
• Neutralisez 3 agents de police.
  • Arrangez-vous pour que les corps ne soient pas retrouvés.

it.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Completa tutte le sfide di "Scassinatore":
  • Nemico pubblico n. 1
  • Ho dimenticato le chiavi
  • Il fabbricante di chiavi
it.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_CROWBAR_DESC: • Apri con un piede di porco le porte principali delle proprietà di Cassidy, Janus, Schmidt e di West.
it.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_POLICE_DESC:
• Neutralizza 3 poliziotti.
  • Fai in modo che i loro corpi non siano rinvenuti.

de.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Schließen Sie alle „Dieb“-Herausforderungen ab:
  • Staatsfeind Nummer 1
  • Schlüssel vergessen
  • Der Schlüsselmeister
de.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_CROWBAR_DESC: • Öffnen Sie mit der Brechstange die Vordertüren der Häuser von Cassidy, Janus, Schmidt und West.
de.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_POLICE_DESC:
• Stellen Sie 3 Polizei-Deputies ruhig.
  • Die Körper dürfen nicht gefunden werden.

es.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Completa todos los desafíos de Ladrón:
  • Enemigo público n.º 1
  • Me dejé las llaves
  • Fabricante de llaves
es.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_CROWBAR_DESC: • Usa una palanqueta para abrir la puerta delantera de las propiedades de Cassidy, Janus, Schmidt y West.
es.CHALLENGEPACK_MAGNESIUM_POLICE_DESC:
• Deja inconscientes a 3 agentes de policía.
  • Que no encuentren sus cadáveres.
